DOC.brief_summary: Physical training may improve physical capacity and health parameters in various systemic autoimmune diseases. Therefore, the present study will assess the role of an exercise training program in patients with relapsing polychondritis.
DOC.brief_title: Physical Training in Patients With Relapsing Polychondritis
DOC.detailed_description: Impact of physical training in patients with relapsing polychondritis.
